ing: 1 cup vodka, or more to taste
1/2 cup triple sec, or more to taste
des: "Yummy frozen beverage. Sugar the rim of the glass and top with a drunken cherry to jazz up the look. You can substitute lime juice for the lemon juice in this recipe."
ins: Blend ice, vodka, mango, triple sec, and lemon juice in a blender until smooth.
